page.description: Specify the Javascript to be executed when the user clicks this button.

discussion.p: The Javascript can reference the 'rowNumber' variable (the zero based row number of the row for the button). 'listObj' (a pointer to the List object). 'data' (a pointer to current row data values) and 'buttonThis' - a pointer to the button object that invoked the action. To read data from a field in the current row use: data.fieldName where 'fieldName' is the case-sensitive name of the field. e.g. data.firstName.
